SamPy.astronomy.stellarMFs.fstarBen¶

SamPy.astronomy.stellarMFs.fstarBen(mh, m1, f0, beta, gamma)¶

Stellar mass to halo mass ratio as a function of halo mass. Fitting function from Moster et al.
